DirectX Version: 7.0 or above

#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Zuma Deluxe_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

In Zuma, it takes a quick hand and a sharp eye to uncover hidden treasures. Look for secret temples in the jungle teeming with traps and a few unexpected tricks! You'll need to eliminate all the balls rolling on-screen before they reach the golden skull. Toss the right color of ball to make matches of three and they disappear. If a ball reaches the skull, you lose a life! Lose your lives and Zuma will have its revenge!
